response.overview: Independent short film, developed from personal experiences involving the everyday life and its aspects of routine and repetition. Resulting in a video performance, actions and aspects, gestures and attitudes, inspired on the daily life.  The film's purpose is make the viewer reflect about their own life, routines, quality and perception about it; and question themselves "could art, in an utopian way, free ourselves from the ties of the everyday life?".  The film represents three moments: repetitive routine, the urge to change and the constant search for freedom originating from art, even if through an utopian way.
response.title: Echoes
